posts.post_content: Looking for a presentable graded Evers portrait ( Authentic, 1 or 1.5), would consider a raw as well, as long as it presents well. Let me know if you have one, thanks.

I have this one but I paid up for it, so it might be a bit more than you are looking to spend. Please PM if interested...thanks

[IMG]https://luckeycards.com/t206eversp.jpg[/IMG]
